result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kyle E. PETERSON

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: All records scanned and verified.

State moves to dismiss and read in this charge, defendant entered a plea in Case File 14 CF 381.  Motion granted.  
Minutes.

Settlement Conference Summary.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is reset to 12-11-14 at 1:30 p.m.

ADDRESS INFO for Kyle E. PETERSON
Current: 400 East Reed Avenue #7, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 09-19-2014)
Prior: c/o Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States

Order Modifying Bail Bond.
The Court hereby orders that defendant's bail in 14 CF 381 is modified to $500.00 cash.  The bails in 14 CF 143 and 12 CF 39 are modified to $1,000.00 personal recognizance bonds.
At 2:42 p.m., $1,000.00 recognizance bond furnished and defendant is released from custody.

Defendant in custody.
This case is riding along with 14 CF 381 which is set for settlement conference with D.A. on 10-30-14 at 9:00 a.m.
Plea date is set for 01-15-15 at 10:30 a.m. in Branch 3.
MOTION TO MODIFY BAIL - 
The parties stipulate to modify the bail from cash to $1,000.00 recognizance bond.  Court grants motion to amend bail.  
Defense counsel to draft order.
Minutes.
Status Conference scheduled for 09-19-2014 @ 2:00 p.m. BR-2

ADDRESS INFO for Kyle E. PETERSON
Current: c/o Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 09-12-2014)
Prior: 2209 Clark St., Manitowoc, WI 54220

Defendant in custody.  
The matter is continued for status conference on 09-15-14 at 4:00 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 cash.  Bail not furnished.  Defendant is remanded to the county jail.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.   
Minutes.
Warrant served.

Defendant failed to appear for a status conference.  
Court authorizes warrant.
Minutes.
Status Conference scheduled for 09-08-2014 @ 11:00 a.m. BR-2.

Settlement Conference Summary.
Status Conference is set for 08-15-2014 @ 3:15 p.m. BR-2.
Settlement conference with the District Attorney is reset to 08-07-14 at 4:00 p.m.

Settlement Conference Summary.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is reset to 07-09-14 at 10:00 a.m.

Defendnt waives his right to a preliminary hearing.  Defendant is bound over to Circuit Court Branch 2 for further proceedings.  Waiver of Right to Preliminary Hearing. 
ARRAIGNMENT 
Information filed.  Not guilty plea.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 06-05-14 at 2:30 p.m.  State's Motion and Demand for Discovery.  
Minutes.
Defendant's Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.  Preliminary hearing is set for 05-28-14 at 2:15 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,500.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that defendant must maintain absolute sobriety and defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and identifying information within 24 hours.  Bail furnished.  
Minutes.
Anthony Lambrecht, Public Defender.

RE:  Possess THC - 2nd offense, on 03-09-14.
Initial appearance is set for 05-12-14 at 2:30 p.m.
